system.requirements: Tier 3; BS 40, Tech-Use, Wep. Training (Launcher) Aptitudes:
system.effect: Character can make ranged attacks with weapons with the indirect quality targeting locations they cannot see as a Half Action instead of a Full Action. When firing an Indirect Weapon or throwing a grenade, roll twice to determine scatter direction and choose either result.
